aws.title: cloud practicioner
aws.description: Certified Cloud Practitioners have a good base understanding of basic IT services and their uses within the AWS Cloud platform. They are capable and have a good understanding of the core AWS services as well as use cases, pricing models, security concepts and how the cloud as a whole impacts businesses.

aws.title: associate developer
aws.description: Certified Associate Developers have a very good understanding of core AWS services, use cases as well as basic understanding of the AWS architecture best practices. They have a decent proficiency in developing, deploying and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS and writing code for server less applications. With a good amount of knowledge on AWS services and said services key features and how to use them. They y are able to apply their basic understanding of cloud-native applications to write code as well as author, maintain and debug code modules on AWS.

aws.title: associate solutions architect
aws.description: Certified Associate Solutions Architects have a very good understanding of the AWS technologies including but not limited to using compute, networking, storage and databases along with the AWS deployment and management services. They are capable of deploying, managing and operating workloads on AWS whilst utilising the security products in order to remain compliant with requirements. They are very familiar with the AWS CLI and Management Console. They have an ability to identify which AWS Services meet certain technical requirements and define equivalent requirements for AWS-based Applications.

aws.title: associate sysops administrator
aws.description: Certified Associate SysOps Administrators have an effective understanding of the AWS technologies specifically in the use cases of system administrators for cloud operations. They have a good understanding of deployment, management and operation of workloads on AWS along with the security infrastructures required. They are comfortable using the AWS Management Console as well as the CLI. Along with all of this they manage to have a base level knowledge on the best practices for AWS Frameworks and networking Architecture.

aws.title: professional devops engineer
aws.description: Certified Professional DevOps Engineers are fully capable of implementing and managing continuous delivery systems and methods on AWS along with automating the security controls, governance processes and any other compliance validating required. They also have a deep understanding of the metrics and logging systems for AWS and are able to define and deploy monitors for said data. They are also capable of designing, managing and maintaining tools to operate all of these operational processes.

aws.title: professional solutions architect
aws.description: Certified Professional Solutions Architects have a proficient ability in designing and deploying scalable, highly available, fault-tolerant and reliable applications on the AWS platform. They have a deeper understanding of the services on offer by AWS and can use this knowledge in order to select the appropriate services to design/deploy an application based on requirements. They are also able to migrate complex and multi-tier applications as well and design and deploy enterprise-wide scalable operations all on AWS.

aws.title: advanced networking
aws.description: Certified Specialists in Advanced Networking design, develop and deploy cloud-based solutions using AWS through implementing core AWS services according to the architectural best practices. They are capable of designing and maintaining network architecture for all AWS services through leveraging tools to automate the AWS networking tasks.

aws.title: data analytics
aws.description: Certified Specialists in Data Analytics are proficient in defining appropriate AWS Data Analytics services and have a deeper understanding of how they integrate with one another. They can also very effectively explain how AWS data analytics services fit within the data life cycle of t collection, storage, processing and visualisation.

aws.title: database
aws.description: Certified Specialists in Databases understand fully the different and key features of AWS database services. They are able to analyse the needs and requirements in order to recommend and design project appropriate database solutions utilising the AWS services.

aws.title: machine learning
aws.description: Certified Specialists in Machine Learning can select and justify the appropriate Machine Learning approach for a given problem and identify which AWS services would be most appropriate in order to implement said Machine Learning solutions. They are also capable of designing and implementing scalable, cost-optimised, reliable and secure Machine Learning solutions.

aws.title: security
aws.description: Certified Specialists in Security have a deep understanding of specialised data classifications and protection mechanisms within AWS as well as of data encryption methods and the AWS mechanisms used to implement them. They bring a good knowledge base on secure internet protocols and have a functioning working knowledge of the AWS security services and what features said services provide to the production environment. They have the ability to make tradeoff decisions with regards to cost, security and complexity of deployment given the requirements and have a phenomenal understanding of security operations and risk.

gcp.title: associate cloud engineer
gcp.description: Associate Cloud Engineers deploy applications, monitors operations, and manages enterprise solutions. With the ability to effectively use the Google Cloud Console and CLI to perform common platform-based tasks in order to maintain one or more deployed solutions on the Google Cloud or a Google-managed platform.

gcp.title: professional cloud architect
gcp.description: Professional Cloud Architects assist organisations to take a greater advantage of Google Cloud technologies with their in-depth understanding of both cloud architecture and Google Cloud as a whole. They are easily capable of designing, developing and managing a robust, secure, scalable and dynamic cloud solutions to drive company and client objectives.

gcp.title: professional security engineer
gcp.description: Professional Security Engineers allow organisations to design and deploy secure workloads and infrastructure on Google Cloud. Utilising their knowledge of both security best practices and industry requirements they can leverage Google security technologies for their projects. Proficient in all aspects of cloud Security such as identity and access management , defining organisational policies, configuration of network security defences and collection and analysing Google Cloud logs.

gcp.title: professional cloud network engineer
gcp.description: Professional Cloud Network Engineers implement and manage network architectures on Google Cloud either working on networking or cloud teams with the architects who design the cloud infrastructure. They use the Google Cloud Console and/or CLI, leveraging their experience with network services, container networking, hybrid and multi-cloud connectivity, implementing VPC's and security for established architectures.

gcp.title: professional data engineer
gcp.description: Professional Data Engineers allow for data-driven decision making through collecting, transforming and publishing data. They are able to design, build, operationalise, secure and monitor data processing systems with a great emphasis placed on, but not limited to, security, compliance, scalability, efficiency, reliability and fidelity. They are also capable of leveraging, deploying and training pre-existing machine learning models.

hashicorp.title: associate terraform engineer
hashicorp.description: Terraform Associate Engineers are Cloud Engineers whom have gained specialised knowledge in operations, IT or development. They are capable of utilising and are knowledgable on the basic concepts and skills associated with HashiCorp Terraform. They are competent in the use of Terraform for production and understand which enterprise specific features exist and what can and cannot be accomplished using the open source offering.

hashicorp.title: vault associate engineer
hashicorp.description: Vault Associate Engineers are Cloud Engineers whom have gain specialised knowledge in security, development or operations. They are capable of utilising and are knowledgable on the basic concepts, skills and use cases associated with HashiCorp Vault. They are competent in the use of Vault for production and understand which enterprise specific features exist and what can and cannot be accomplished using the open source offering.

hashicorp.title: consul associate engineer
hashicorp.description: Consul Associate Engineers are Site Reliability Engineers, Solutions Architects, DevOps professionals as well as a Cloud Engineers who are capable of utilising and are knowledgable on the basic concepts and skills in order to build, secure and maintain HashiCorp Consul. They are competent in the use of Consul for production and understand which enterprise specific features exist and what can and cannot be accomplished using the open source offering.

azure.title: azure fundamentals
azure.description: Being Microsoft Certified in the Azure Fundamentals means having a basic understanding of cloud concepts as well as core Azure services. They have the capability of describing and explaining the core solutions and management tools on Azure as well as general security and network security features. They also have a good base level knowledge on Azure cost management and Service Level Agreements.

azure.title: associate developer
azure.description: Microsoft Certified Azure Associate Developers have the ability to develop Azure compute solutions along with Azure storage. They are able to implement basic Azure security measures and can monitor, troubleshoot and optimise most Azure solutions.

azure.title: devops engineer expert
azure.description: Microsoft Certified Azure DevOps Experts can develop an instrumentation strategy, a Site Reliability Engineering strategy as well as a security and compliance plan. They are capable of managing source control along with defining and implementing continuous integration and a continuous delivery and release management system.

azure.title: security engineer associate
azure.description: Microsoft Certified Azure Security Engineering Associates are capable of managing identities and the access granted. They can implement basic platform protection and manage the security operations and assist in keep data and applications secure.

azure.title: solutions architect expert
azure.description: Microsoft Certified Azure Solutions Architect Experts implement, and monitor, Azure infrastructure as well as implementing management solutions, security solutions and application solutions along with managing data platforms. They are also fully capable of designing monitoring solutions, identity and security, data storage, business continuity and the overall infrastructure.

azure.title: ai fundamentals
azure.description: Being Microsoft Certified in Azure AI Fundamentals means being able to describe AI workloads and considerations as well as the fundamental principles of machine learning on Azure. They have a base level understanding of the features of computer vision workloads on Azure along with Natural Language Processing workloads on Azure. They also understand the features of conversational AI within Azure.

azure.title: data fundamentals
azure.description: Being Microsoft Certified in Azure Data Fundamentals means being Abel to describe in detail core data concepts and how to work with relational and non-relational data on Azure as well as having a good understanding of analytical workloads on Azure.
